org.jamwiki.db

Interface QueryHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnsiQueryHandler, CacheQueryHandler, DB2400QueryHandler, DB2QueryHandler, H2QueryHandler, HSqlQueryHandler, MSSqlQueryHandler, MySqlQueryHandler, OracleQueryHandler, PostgresQueryHandler, SybaseASAQueryHandler

    public interface QueryHandler
    This interface provides all methods needed for retrieving, inserting, or updating data from the database.

    • Field Summary

      This method is used primarily to determine if a topic with a given name exists, taking as input a topic name and virtual wiki and returning the corresponding topic name, or null if no matching topic exists.

      Retrieve a list of all topic names within a virtual wiki.

      Utility method used when importing to updating the previous topic version ID field of topic versions, as well as the current version ID field for the topic record.

      Refresh the log entries by rebuilding the data based on topic versions, file uploads, and user information.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateUser

        boolean authenticateUser(String login,
                         String encryptedPassword,
                         Connection conn)
                  throws SQLException
        Retrieve a result set containing all user information for a given WikiUser.
        Parameters:
        login - The login of the user record being retrieved.
        encryptedPassword - The encrypted password for the user record being retrieved.
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Returns:
        true if the login and password matches an existing user, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • autoIncrementPrimaryKeys

        boolean autoIncrementPrimaryKeys()
        Some databases support automatically incrementing primary key values without the need to explicitly specify a value, thus improving performance. This method provides a way for the a query handler to specify whether or not auto-incrementing is supported.
        Returns:
        true if the query handler supports auto-incrementing primary keys.

      • connectionValidationQuery

        String connectionValidationQuery()
        Returns the simplest possible query that can be used to validate whether or not a database connection is valid. Note that the query returned MUST NOT query any JAMWiki tables since it will be used prior to setting up the JAMWiki tables.
        Returns:
        Returns a simple query that can be used to validate a database connection.

      • createTables

        void createTables(Connection conn)
           throws SQLException
        Method called to set up all JAMWiki system tables, indexes, and other required database objects. If a failure occurs during object creation then this method will not attempt to clean up any objects that were created prior to the failure.
        Parameters:
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • deleteGroupAuthorities

        void deleteGroupAuthorities(int groupId,
                            Connection conn)
                     throws SQLException
        Delete all authorities for a specific group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - The group id for which authorities are being deleted.
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • deleteInterwiki

        void deleteInterwiki(Interwiki interwiki,
                     Connection conn)
              throws SQLException
        Delete an interwiki record from the interwiki table.
        Parameters:
        interwiki - The Interwiki record to be deleted.
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

                         Connection conn)
                  throws SQLException
        Delete all records from the recent changes table for a specific topic.

        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

                           Connection conn)
                    throws SQLException
        Delete all categories associated with a topic.
        Parameters:

        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • deleteTopicLinks

        void deleteTopicLinks(int topicId,
                      Connection conn)
               throws SQLException
        Delete all topic links associated with a topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - The topic for which link association records are being deleted.
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • deleteTopicVersion

        void deleteTopicVersion(int topicVersionId,
                        Integer previousTopicVersionId,
                        Connection conn)
                 throws SQLException
        Delete a topic version record. This method will fail if there is a topic with the version as its current version ID, or if there is a topic version with the version as its previous topic version, but should update references in all other tables.
        Parameters:
        topicVersionId - The version record that is being deleted.
        previousTopicVersionId - If this record was referenced as a "previous topic version ID" then this value will be used as the replacement for those records.
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • deleteUserAuthorities

        void deleteUserAuthorities(String username,
                           Connection conn)
                    throws SQLException
        Delete all authorities for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username for which authorities are being deleted.
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • deleteGroupMap

        void deleteGroupMap(GroupMap groupMap,
                    Connection conn)
             throws SQLException
        Delete group membership from database. Notice that this may be the deletion of all members of a group (when acting as a container of group users) or the deletion of all memberships of a user (when acting as a group list for a user).
        Parameters:
        groupMap - The GroupMap to delete
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • deleteWatchlistEntry

        void deleteWatchlistEntry(int virtualWikiId,
                          String topicName,
                          int userId,
                          Connection conn)
                   throws SQLException
        Delete a user's watchlist entry using the topic name to determine which entry to remove.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiId - The id of the virtual wiki for which the watchlist entry is being deleted.
        topicName - The topic name for which the watchlist entry is being deleted.
        userId - The user for which the watchlist entry is being deleted.
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • dropTables

        void dropTables(Connection conn)
        Drop all JAMWiki database objects. This method drops tables, indexes, and any database objects, as well as all data in those objects. Note that if a failure occurs while deleting any one object the method will continue trying to delete any remaining objects.
        Parameters:
        conn - A database connection to use when connecting to the database from this method.

      • executeUpgradeQuery

        void executeUpgradeQuery(String prop,
                         Connection conn)
                  throws SQLException
        This method should be called only during upgrades and provides the capability to execute a SQL query from a QueryHandler-specific property file.
        Parameters:
        prop - The name of the SQL property file value to execute.
        conn - The SQL connection to use when executing the SQL.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during execution.

      • executeUpgradeUpdate

        boolean executeUpgradeUpdate(String prop,
                             Connection conn)
                      throws SQLException
        This method should be called only during upgrades and provides the capability to execute update SQL from a QueryHandler-specific property file.
        Parameters:
        prop - The name of the SQL property file value to execute.
        conn - The SQL connection to use when executing the SQL.
        Returns:
        true if action actually performed and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during execution.

      • existenceValidationQuery

        String existenceValidationQuery()
        Return a simple query, that if successfully run indicates that JAMWiki tables have been initialized in the database.
        Returns:
        Returns a simple query that, if successfully run, indicates that JAMWiki tables have been set up in the database.

      • getAllWikiFileVersions

        List<WikiFileVersion> getAllWikiFileVersions(WikiFile wikiFile,
                                             boolean descending)
                                      throws SQLException
        Retrieve a list of all wiki file version information for a given wiki file. Version information is sorted by wiki file version id, which in effect sorts the wiki file versions from newest to oldest.
        Parameters:
        wikiFile - A WikiFile object for which version information is to be retrieved.
        descending - If true then results are sorted newest to oldest.
        Returns:
        A list of all wiki file versions for the file, or an empty list if no versions exist.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • getCategories

        List<Category> getCategories(int virtualWikiId,
                             String virtualWikiName,
                             Pagination pagination)
                      throws SQLException
        Retrieve a list of all categories associated with a particular virtual wiki. The list may be limited by specifying the number of results to retrieve in a Pagination object.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiId - The virtual wiki id for the virtual wiki from which all categories are to be retrieved.
        virtualWikiName - The name of the virtual wiki for which results are being retrieved.
        pagination - A Pagination object that specifies the number of results and starting result offset for the result set to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A list of all categories associated with a particular virtual wiki, or an empty list if no categories exist for the virtual wiki.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • getLogItems

        List<LogItem> getLogItems(int virtualWikiId,
                          String virtualWikiName,
                          int logType,
                          Pagination pagination,
                          boolean descending)
                   throws SQLException
        Retrieve a list of all recent log items for a specific virtual wiki.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiId - The id of the virtual wiki for which log items are being retrieved.
        virtualWikiName - The name of the virtual wiki for which results are being retrieved.
        logType - Set to -1 if all log items should be returned, otherwise set the log type for items to retrieve.
        pagination - A Pagination object that specifies the number of results and starting result offset for the result set to be retrieved.
        descending - If true then results are sorted newest to oldest.
        Returns:
        A list of LogItems, or an empty list if no log items are available.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • getRecentChanges

        List<RecentChange> getRecentChanges(String virtualWiki,
                                    Pagination pagination,
                                    boolean descending)
                             throws SQLException
        Retrieve a list of all recent changes made to the wiki for a specific virtual wiki.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The name of the virtual wiki for which results are being retrieved.
        pagination - A Pagination object that specifies the number of results and starting result offset for the result set to be retrieved.
        descending - If true then results are sorted newest to oldest.
        Returns:
        A list of recent change results for the virtual wiki and pagination, or an empty list if no results are found.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • getRoleMapByLogin

        List<RoleMap> getRoleMapByLogin(String loginFragment)
                         throws SQLException
        Retrieve a list of user ids, group ids and role names for all users whose login contains the given login fragment.
        Parameters:
        loginFragment - A value that must be contained with the user's login. This method will return partial matches, so "name" will match "name", "firstname" and "namesake".
        Returns:
        A list of user ids, group ids and role names for all users whose login contains the login fragment. If no matches are found then this method returns an empty list.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • getTopicHistory

        List<RecentChange> getTopicHistory(int topicId,
                                   Pagination pagination,
                                   boolean descending,
                                   boolean selectDeleted)
                            throws SQLException
        Retrieve a list of all history for a specific topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - The id of the topic for which recent changes are being retrieved.
        pagination - A Pagination object that specifies the number of results and starting result offset for the result set to be retrieved.
        descending - If true then results are sorted newest to oldest.
        selectDeleted - Set to true if revisions for deleted versions of the topic should be returned, false for active versions of the topic.
        Returns:
        A list of recent change objects, or an empty list if not topic history exists.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • lookupTopicByType

        Map<Integer,String> lookupTopicByType(int virtualWikiId,
                                      TopicType topicType1,
                                      TopicType topicType2,
                                      int namespaceStart,
                                      int namespaceEnd,
                                      Pagination pagination)
                               throws SQLException
        Retrieve a list of all topic names of a given type within a virtual wiki.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiId - The virtual wiki id for the virtual wiki of the topics being retrieved.
        topicType1 - The topic type (image, normal, etc) for the topics to be retrieved.
        topicType2 - The topic type (image, normal, etc) for the topics to be retrieved. Set to the same value as topicType1 if only one topic type is needed.
        namespaceStart - The minimum namespace ID value for the result set. This parameter provides a way to use the same queries to return results from all namespaces or from only a single namespace.
        namespaceEnd - The maximum namespace ID value for the result set. This parameter provides a way to use the same queries to return results from all namespaces or from only a single namespace.
        pagination - A Pagination object that specifies the number of results and starting result offset for the result set to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A map of topic id and topic name for all topic names of a given type within a virtual wiki, and within the bounds specified by the pagination object. If no results are found then an empty list is returned.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • lookupTopicCount

        int lookupTopicCount(int virtualWikiId,
                     int namespaceStart,
                     int namespaceEnd)
              throws SQLException
        Return a count of all topics, including redirects, comments pages and templates, currently available on the Wiki. This method excludes deleted topics.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiId - The virtual wiki id for the virtual wiki of the topics being retrieved.
        namespaceStart - The minimum namespace ID value for the result set. This parameter provides a way to use the same queries to return results from all namespaces or from only a single namespace.
        namespaceEnd - The maximum namespace ID value for the result set. This parameter provides a way to use the same queries to return results from all namespaces or from only a single namespace.
        Returns:
        The total number of topics for the virtual wiki and (optionally) namespace.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

      • lookupTopicName

        String lookupTopicName(int virtualWikiId,
                       String virtualWikiName,
                       Namespace namespace,
                       String pageName)
                throws SQLException
        This method is used primarily to determine if a topic with a given name exists, taking as input a topic name and virtual wiki and returning the corresponding topic name, or null if no matching topic exists. This method will return only non-deleted topics and performs better for cases where a caller only needs to know if a topic exists, but does not need a full Topic object.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiId - The ID of the virtual wiki for the topic being queried.
        virtualWikiName - The name of the virtual wiki for the virtual wiki of the topic being retrieved.
        namespace - The Namespace for the topic being retrieved.
        pageName - The topic pageName (topic name without the namespace) for the topic being retrieved.
        Returns:
        The name of the Topic object that matches the given virtual wiki and topic name, or null if no matching topic exists.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.

                        int virtualWikiId,
                        List<Integer> topicVersionIdList)
                 throws SQLException

        Parameters:

        topicVersionIdList - A list of all topic version IDs for the topic, sorted chronologically from oldest to newest.

                  throws SQLException

                       int resized)
                throws SQLException
        Parameters:

        SQLException - Thrown if any error occurs during method execution.
